item.Q:
Write the character:
shape; form; appearance; elephant; image under a map (math.)
item.A:
xiàng
现象 (現象) xiànxiàng appearance; phenomenon

item.Q:
Write the character:
remove; do away with; wipe out; divide; except
item.A:
chú
除了 chúle besides; apart from (... also...); in addition to; except (for)

item.Q:
Write the character:
to receive; to accept; to collect; in care of (used on address line after name)
item.A:
shōu
吸收 xīshōu to absorb; to assimilate; to ingest

item.Q:
Write the character:
to read aloud; twenty (banker's anti-fraud numeral corresponding to 廿)
item.A:
念 (strokes unavailable)
niàn
概念 gàiniàn concept; idea

item.Q:
Write the character:
to show; reveal
item.A:
shì
表示 biǎoshì to express; to show; to say; to state; to indicate

item.Q:
Write the character:
regiment; round; circular; group; society
item.A:
traditional: 團
tuán
团结 (團結) tuánjié (hold a) rally; join forces

item.Q:
Write the character:
again; recover; reply to a letter; to repeat; to duplicate
item.A:
traditional: 復
fù
恢复 (恢復) huīfù to reinstate; to resume; to restore; to recover; to regain

item.Q:
Write the character:
festival; section; segment; point; part; to economize; to save; temperate; classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses
item.A:
traditional: 節
jié
调节 (調節) tiáojié adjust; regulate

item.Q:
Write the character:
positive (electric.); sun; male principle (Taoism); Yang, opposite of 陰|阴 yin1 ☯
item.A:
阳 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 陽
yáng
阳光 (陽光) yángguāng sunshine
